Terminator: Resistance is underrated, although the machines will be *much* better than this & have 360 deg long-range FoV (sigh). Cyberpunk is brilliant.

entry.title: Re @BillyM2k @nichegamer Played some & will continue. I use 🐭 & ⌨️, which is suboptimal, but ok with remapping. Art is incredible, story is good,...
entry.summary: Re @BillyM2k @nichegamer Played some & will continue. I use 🐭 & ⌨️, which is suboptimal, but ok with remapping. Art is incredible, story is good, altho I’m still confused about what’s going on haha. Nonlinear play style & no spoon-feeding are cool.
